![Partner Spotlight | Human Passport](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/e064dde4241ce8227d4061995f2f53dc1ba28c7585d94bdffa88f81195853633.jpg)

<p>A bit over a year ago, Unlock Labs integrated the Gitcoin Passport hook into the protocol. A lot has changed since then, starting with the fact that the Gitcoin Passport is now called&nbsp;<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://passport.human.tech/"><strong>Human Passport</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;</strong>and has become part of <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="http://Human.tech"><strong>human.tech</strong></a><strong> </strong>and the <strong>Holonym Foundation</strong>. Human Passport has matured and is now more focused than ever on laying the foundations for an internet where people and not bots hold the keys to trust in a trustless world.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/partner-spotlight---human-passport/02149a9bbd89e542a0c183a6d54d2436694d2fd037740aab5c985c46828271f6.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="921" nextwidth="1600" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><hr><h2 id="h-why-human-passport" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Why Human Passport </h2><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/partner-spotlight---human-passport/f4d4480e444d7f498ebac5d57a81005255e60ef9e3a6b8d2aef99bafe32e4637.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="630" nextwidth="1200" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>The internet was built for connection, but automated accounts and sybil attacks have eroded trust. <strong>Hacks and exploits </strong>of an AI nature have <strong>soared 1025%</strong> this year (according to <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://hacken.io/insights/h1-2025-security-report/">Hacken</a>), yet roughly 34% of Web3 projects deploy now AI components that widen the potential attack surface. </p><p>With the Human Passport in Unlock Protocol, you can guarantee that whoever buys your membership, reserves a free ticket to your event, or subscribes to your product is a <strong>real human</strong>, not a bot-driven wallet. The beautiful part, though, is that that type of authenticity doesn't come at the price of surveillance or personal data collection, and therefore is extremely end-user-friendly.</p><blockquote><h2 id="h-together-were-not-just-building-for-humans-were-building-with-them" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>“Together, we’re not just building for humans — we’re building with them.”</strong></h2></blockquote><p><strong>Proof-of-humanity</strong> is the foundation of credible decentralized ecosystems. Human Passport provides a solution through aggregated verification called <strong>Stamps</strong> — credentials that represent verifiable human activity patterns, such as KYC attestations, biometric proofs, Web3 activity, and social connections. These build a <strong>Unique Humanity Score</strong> that protocols such as Unlock can use to assess the trustworthiness of an address while protecting user privacy using zero-knowledge methods.​</p><hr><h2 id="h-the-unlock-human-passport-hook" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">The Unlock Human Passport Hook</h2><p>How it works? Well, it's easier than you'd think.</p><ul><li><p>Create your lock (smart contract) with <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://unlock-protocol.com/">Unlock Protocol</a> or navigate to an already existing one in your dashboard.</p></li><li><p>On the Unlock lock dashboard, head to the Settings menu in the upper right corner</p></li><li><p>In the side menu, choose the "Advanced" tab and add the Passport Hook from the drop-down list.</p></li><li><p>Don't forget to set a reasonable score and deploy the change onchain by signing a transaction. The Human Passport team suggests a score of 20. </p></li></ul><p>Now, every time someone wants to access or purchase your membership, product, or event ticket, they will need to prove their personhood has been validated through the&nbsp;<strong>Human Passport</strong> (verification is done via the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="http://app.passport.xyz">Passport app</a>). This makes tracking your stats more reliable and, most of all, guarantees that whatever you put out there with Unlock is actually used and appreciated by fellow humans.</p><div data-type="youtube" videoid="I19WtTbamZM">
      <div class="youtube-player" data-id="I19WtTbamZM" style="background-image: url('https://i.ytimg.com/vi/I19WtTbamZM/hqdefault.jpg'); background-size: cover; background-position: center">
        <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I19WtTbamZM">
          <img src="/images/blog/partner-spotlight---human-passport/play.png" class="play">
        </a>
      </div></div><hr><h2 id="h-join-our-livestream-with-daniel-brunsdon" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Join Our Livestream with Daniel Brunsdon</h2><p>Daniel Brunsdon is the Lead for Growth and Product at <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="http://Human.tech">human.tech</a>.  Before Daniel joined the Gitcoin Passport and eventually the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="http://Human.tech">human.tech</a>&nbsp;crew, he worked at Twitter, where he had a front-row seat to a network of bots impersonating people's identities, resulting in fake engagement and false analytics. This often leaves communities and projects with empty shells of numbers that should see a return but won't.</p><p>After joining Gitcoin, his sole focus became solving the hardest challenge in digital systems, such as verifying real people without surveillance or exclusion. At <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="http://human.tech">human.tech</a>, Daniel is driving the adoption of important tools, just like the Human Passport, to create a positive impact on humans through advanced technology. </p><p>Daniel will be with us on a <strong>Livestream on the 30th of October at 2 PM EST</strong>. He will showcase firsthand how the <strong>Human Passport</strong> hook works and how you can implement it with a few clicks into <strong>your event</strong>, <strong>membership</strong>, <strong>subscription program</strong>, or <strong>certifications with Unlock</strong>. Get notified below.</p><div data-type="youtube" videoid="8oiPhN39YHo">
